mapper.select:
SELECT p.id AS id, p.title, p.content, p.user_id AS userId, p.view_count AS viewCount, p.like_count AS likeCount, p.comment_count AS commentCount, p.is_top AS isTop, p.is_essence AS isEssence, p.status, p.creation_time AS createTime, p.last_update_time AS updateTime, u.username AS authorName FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.id
AND (p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.keyword}, '%') OR p.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.keyword}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.keyword}, '%'))
AND p.status = #{params.status}
ORDER BY (p.view_count * 0.3 + p.like_count * 0.4 + p.comment_count * 0.3) DESC
ORDER BY p.last_update_time DESC
ORDER BY p.creation_time DESC
